Working from home meant we could vary snack and coffee breaks, change our desks or view, goof off, drink on the job, even spend the day in pajamas, and often meet to gossip or share ideas. On the other hand, we bossed ourselves around, set impossible goals, and demanded longer hours than office jobs usually entail. It was the ultimate “flextime,” in that it depended on how flexible we felt each day, given deadlines, distractions, and workaholic crescendos. item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[column width="1/1" last="true" title="Progressio" title_type="single" implicit="true"]
[accordion collapsible="false"] [pane title="How to enjoy life?"]You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
[/pane]
[pane title="Do I need to read often?"]Employ your time in improving yourself by other men's writings, so that you shall gain easily what others have labored hard for.
[/pane]
[pane title="Can I work from home?"]Working from home meant we could vary snack and coffee breaks, change our desks or view, goof off, drink on the job, even spend the day in pajamas, and often meet to gossip or share ideas. On the other hand, we bossed ourselves around, set impossible goals, and demanded longer hours than office jobs usually entail. It was the ultimate “flextime,” in that it depended on how flexible we felt each day, given deadlines, distractions, and workaholic crescendos. In order that people may be happy in their work, these three things are needed: They must be fit for it. They must not do too much of it. And they must have a sense of success in it.
[/pane]
[pane title="Are you a Human Being?"]All that we are is the result of what we have thought. If a man speaks or acts with an evil thought, pain follows him. If a man speaks or acts with a pure thought, happiness follows him, like a shadow that never leaves him.
[/pane]
[pane title="What is needed to become a poet?"]I decided that it was not wisdom that enabled poets to write their poetry, but a kind of instinct or inspiration, such as you find in seers and prophets who deliver all their sublime messages without knowing in the least what they mean.
[/pane]
[pane title="How to practice MMA?"]It is better to conquer yourself than to win a thousand battles. Then the victory is yours. It cannot be taken from you, not by angels or by demons, heaven or hell.
[/pane]
[pane title="Do I need colors, when painting?"]Sixteen million colors in your palette are hard for any artist, especially a beginner, to turn down.
[/pane]
[pane title="What does it take to become a vegetarian?"]I am not a vegetarian because I love animals; I am a vegetarian because I hate plants.
[/pane]
[pane title="Is there anything at all you can not do?"]Talent does what it can; genius does what it must.
[/pane] [/accordion]
[/column]
[column width="1/1" last="true" title="Studium" title_type="single" implicit="true"]

[/pane] [pane title="Are you a Human Being?"]All that we are is the result of what we have thought. If a man speaks or acts with an evil thought, pain follows him. Mobile Support

[/column] [column width="1/4" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="css3" color="accent1" size="50" style="inverted-colors"] [push h="10"]

Browser Compatibility

[/column] [column width="1/4" last="true" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="users" color="accent1" size="50" style="inverted-colors"] [push h="10"]

Timely Support - response times usually less than 8 hours.

[/column] [blank h="30"] [/blank] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="alarm" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  New in Makalu

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • New - Revolutionary and easy to use Drag & Drop page and post builder.
  • New - Revamped Admin Option Panel.
  • New - 900 Premium Icon Set - $39 Value!.
  • New - Layered Slider Responsive WordPress Plugin – $15 Value!
  • New - Support for the premium plugin - Mega Menu.
  • New - Support for the premium plugin - Quform.
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="cool" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  Next-generation features

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • Retina ready
  • Responsive liquid layout (320px to 960px).
  • Hardware-acceleration on sliders and all javascript.
  • Touch Enabled Sliders with swiping.
  • Gracefully degrades in older browsers.
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" last="true" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="clock1" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  Top notch customer support

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • Help Desk with one on one email and ticket support and dedicated support staff ready to assist you.
  • Response times usually 12-24 hours.
  • Video tutorials for beginners.
  • Extensive set up guide for beginners.
  • In-Dashboard Contextual Help. Тhere are little helpers everywhere in the interface, that let you retrieve quick information about the particular fields you are currently viewing.
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="cube" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  Endless layout possibilities

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • Boxed and full-width layout.
  • Option to enable or disable responsiveness.
  • Any page can be home page. Set-up your own home page as you wish! Unlimited Homepage variations
  • Flexible 6 sidebars in body and in footer.
  • Flexible left, right or both sidebars on inner pages and posts.
  • Unlimited Dynamic Sidebars.
  • Unique widget areas for posts/pages.
  • Global archive templates.
  • Per page and per post option panels.
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="cogs" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  Powerfull theme options

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • New - Revolutionary and easy to use Drag & Drop page builder.
  • New - Revamped Admin Option Panel.
  • Drag & drop slider management.
  • Shortcode generator.
  • Tons of shortcodes with tiny MCE visual integration!
[/list]Powerfully Simple Theme Options [/column] [column width="1/3" last="true" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="shocked" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  Professional translation

Makalu is professionally translated into English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish. WPML support Full localization support for the languages that have not been translated yet (contains .po/.mo files) All of our themes have been localized for easy translation. Included with each theme are sets of .mo and .po files that can be used to translate the theme, which means you wont have to spend hours searching through PHP files for English words. [/column] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="eye" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  Unlimited styles

New - 900 Premium Icon Set - $39 Value!. 30 + custom ready to use pages with amazing design. Theme skin switcher with 4 predefined skins. 200+ Shortcodes All our themes include Custom Shortcodes that allow you to easily add buttons, boxes, social buttons, columns andmore to your posts, pages and widgets. Fullscreen background images Set a different background image for each page Set a different background color for each page. 55 + color pickers to style every element The theme will let you customize the style and typography of every element in the design. Packed with 100+ options, it allows you to make your website look exactly like you want! Child Theme Support for Advanced Users [/column] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="bug1" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  Teck-savvy

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • Vamtam Rock Solid Theme Framework.
  • Lighting fast. Exceptional page-load performance straight out of the box.Nothing’s required but a standard PHP web hosting and CDN.
  • Valid HTML5 and CSS3 design following all modern best practices. Designed primarily with CSS, minimal graphics means minimal load-time.
  • Consistent code structure.
  • No timb tumb.Native WordPress Thumbnails support
  • Easily modify the theme options pages with our meta programming options generator.
  • Very well-maintained and minimalistic code structure.
  • Pixel perfect design.
  • Custom post type support for Portfolios and Slides.
  • Unobtrusive CSS3 and jQuery-powered effects.
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" last="true" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="puzzle" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  Page/Post drag & drop builder

The VamTam drag & drop page is a very rich tool with simple interface for building any page or post layout with simple drag & drop. You don’t need to touch one line of code for creating your page layout and elements. This tool will save you lots of time on building your pages or posts. The VamTam drag & drop page builder is tightly integrated with tinymce editor and you can switch to visual or text editor at any time without losing any changes. Drad & Drop page builder works with blog and portfolio posts [/column] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="download" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  One-click demo content install

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • Integrated Envato Toolkit - you can update the theme from the admin panel.
  • Demo content and configuration one click install.
  • Widget importer.
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="database" color="accent2" size="28" style""]  Retina ready

Out-of-the-box HiDPI/Retina support* * This theme doesn't use any images - instead, we use vector icons which look perfectly sharp on high resolution screens. We've also made sure that any images uploaded by you (featured images, etc.) have twice the width of the available space. [/column] [column width="1/3" last="true" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="cog3" color="accent2" size="28" style""]  Sidebar manager

Custom sidebars for posts and pages. Sidebar Manager allows you to replace all widgetized sidebars in our themes with unique custom sidebar. [/column] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="font" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  Font replacement

You can change any text on your site to the font of your liking and you can preview fonts in the admin panel [list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • Google fonts support - 400+ fonts
  • Font Face
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="mail-send" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  Contact Form 7

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • Create forms easily with Contact Form 7
  • Working Contact Form – right out of the box.
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" last="true" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="database" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  10+ portfolio layouts

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • Re-sizable full screen portfolio with categories and touch swipe support.
  • Ajax portfolio.
  • Filtered portfolio with cool CSS3 animations.
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="android" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  Mobile support

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
    • Responsive liquid layout (320px to 960px).
    • Out-of-the-box HiDPI/Retina support.
    • Responsive Sliders.
    • Responsive full width portfolio with categories and swipe support.
    • Option to enable or disable responsiveness.
    • Hardware-acceleration on sliders and all javascript.
    • Touch Enabled Sliders with swiping.
    • Gracefully degrades in older browsers.
    • Dedicated mobile design, looks perfect on your Iphone and Ipad.
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="coin" color="accent2" size="28" style=""] Responsive sliders

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • New - Layered Slider Responsive WordPress Plugin – $15 Value!
  • VamTam responsive slider with touch swipe support. The slider is fully responsive and integrate beautifully with the layout, it offers hardware-accelerated CSS3 transitions with standard javascript fallback for the few unsupported browsers/devices.
  • Drag & drop slider management.
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" last="true" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="database" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  11 custom widgets

[list style="theme-arrow-right" color="accent5"]
  • Vamtam Post Formats Widgets.
  • Vamtam Ads Widget.
  • Vamtam Video Widget.
  • Vamtam Popular Posts Widget.
  • Vamtam Contact Widget.
  • Vamtam Twitter Widget.
  • Vamtam Sub Navigation.
  • Vamtam Flickr Widget.
  • Vamtam Social Icons Widget.
  • Vamtam Google Map Widget.
  • Vamtam Author Widget.
[/list] [/column] [column width="1/3" last="true" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]

[icon name="database" color="accent2" size="28" style=""]  SEO friendly

Built with semantic best practices and search engines in mind! Support for All in one SEO pack plugin. Support for WordPress SEO plugin by Yoost [/column]

item.title: Hall of Fame
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[blockquote cite="Richard Pearson"]Vamtam have gone way beyond the normal levels of support and are quick to address any questions I have had in a patient and very friendly manner. I am not a Wordpress expert and after just 1 hour of editing and uploading my site is already looking something like I hoped it would.

I wish these top notch guys all the best with everything they produce and hope that that gets the spoils they deserve from Progressio and any future themes they produce.

[/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="Jody LaRue"]Thanks for your help. I’ll be keeping an eye out for future themes by you.[/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="Csomortáni Botond"] Thanks for you great support!  Keep up the good job! [/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="Amy Hannay"]Thanks so much for the support and again… loving the theme![/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="Kristy Crabtree"]You guys ROCK ! Thank you so much.[/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="Dave Meaden"]Thanks Mario, your support is by far the best I've experienced, and I look forward to future themes from your company.[/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="Rob"]Our company has been buying on Envato marketplaces for a while now. We buy many things everyday. Vamtam’s level of support is second to none. We have never been so happy to work with a developer from Envato before. There product is perfect and the best we have seen. We highly recommend Vamtam.[/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="Denis St-Amour"]You guys really know customer service. Thanks for making my life easy!! And a huge thanks to Mario![/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="Amber"]Just a quick thank you for all the help and support. I have been a member for 5 years and purchased 100’s of themes, I highly recommend this theme to anyone considering it. Amazing versatility and options… sooo many tasty options, this template can easily be anything you want it to be, wrap this up in a coating of outstanding support and you have yourself a yummy package worth a lot more than the asking price. Thank you for a great product! Amber [/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="Karen"]As a web business owner, I have reviewed many websites in the past and tried many to.. I would like to say a big thank you for the Studium theme. The featured rich options and features are second to none, and having the layout possibilities are tremendous. Thank you so much for making this theme available, and for replying quickly to questions. Now, can’t wait to get things set up Best regards. Karen[/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="calvaryconcepts.com"]I have wor ked with dozens of theme authors. I want to express my sincerest gratitude in your tireless efforts to resolve and quickly resolve all questions and perceived issues. Most issues were resolved immediately in a response. Your ticketing system at the Vamtam support is great and I would like to see you build that knowledge base up with the comments on Themeforest. You modified a custom plugin to be compatible with your theme which was necessary as a key feature on the website. My experience has been great and will gladly support your future themes. best support of all my experience with themes at themeforest. bar none the best. Thanks Nikolay[/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="Eddy"]OK so I have had some time to get to grips with this theme with the help from the fantastic support at support.vamtam.com Initially I was quite daunted by the amount of customisation one can do with this theme, especially the slider concepts which make total sense now! I think this is one of the most beautiful themes in themeforest and on top of that the best one I have ever used to get my site looking how I want it to look. Well done guys for a great theme.[/blockquote]   [blockquote cite="Richard James Molloy"]Hi Nikolay, I’ll be more than happy to rate your theme 5 stars, I can honestly say it is by far the best theme I have worked with. Many thanks.[/blockquote]

Ignorant men raise questions that wise men answered a thousand years ago.

Working from home meant we could vary snack and coffee breaks, change our desks or view, goof off, drink on the job, even spend the day in pajamas, and often meet to gossip or share ideas. On the other hand, we bossed ourselves around, set impossible goals, and demanded longer hours than office jobs usually entail. It was the ultimate “flextime,” in that it depended on how flexible we felt each day, given deadlines, distractions, and workaholic crescendos. Claritas est etiam processus dynamicus, qui sequitur mutationem consuetudium lectorum. Mirum est notare quam littera gothica, quam nunc putamus parum claram, anteposuerit litterarum formas humanitatis per seacula quarta decima et quinta decima. Eodem modo typi, qui nunc nobis videntur parum clari, fiant sollemnes in futurum.

item.title: HTML Item
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Aristotle made several efforts to explain how moral conduct contributes to the good life for human agents, including the Eqikh EudaimonhV and the Magna Moralia, but the most complete surviving statement of his views on morality occurs in the Eqikh Nikomacoi .
But on Aristotle’s view, the lives of individual human beings are invariably linked together in a social context. In the Peri PoliV he speculated about the origins of the state, described and assessed the relative merits of various types of government, and listed the obligations of the individual citizen.

item.title: Flash Item
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Aristotle made several efforts to explain how moral conduct contributes to the good life for human agents, including the Eqikh EudaimonhV and the Magna Moralia, but the most complete surviving statement of his views on morality occurs in the Eqikh Nikomacoi .
But on Aristotle’s view, the lives of individual human beings are invariably linked together in a social context. In the Peri PoliV he speculated about the origins of the state, described and assessed the relative merits of various types of government, and listed the obligations of the individual citizen.

But on Aristotle’s view, the lives of individual human beings are invariably linked together in a social context. [push h="10"]There he considered the natural desire to achieve happiness, described the operation of human volition and moral deliberation, developed a theory of each virtue as the mean between vicious extremes, discussed the value of three kinds of friendship, and defended his conception of an ideal life of intellectual pursuit. Working from home meant we could vary snack and coffee breaks, change our desks or view, goof off, drink on the job, even spend the day in pajamas, and often meet to gossip or share ideas. On the other hand, we bossed ourselves around, set impossible goals, and demanded longer hours than office jobs usually entail. It was the ultimate “flextime,” in that it depended on how flexible we felt each day, given deadlines, distractions, and workaholic crescendos. item.title: Speedometer
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Aristotle made several efforts to explain how moral conduct contributes to the good life for human agents, including the Eqikh EudaimonhV and the Magna Moralia, but the most complete surviving statement of his views on morality occurs in the Eqikh Nikomacoi .
[blockquote cite="Aristotle"]There he considered the natural desire to achieve happiness, described the operation of human volition and moral deliberation, developed a theory of each virtue as the mean between vicious extremes, discussed the value of three kinds of friendship, and defended his conception of an ideal life of intellectual pursuit.[/blockquote]
But on Aristotle’s view, the lives of individual human beings are invariably linked together in a social context. In the Peri PoliV he speculated about the origins of the state, described and assessed the relative merits of various types of government, and listed the obligations of the individual citizen.
item.excerpt:encoded: We create unique simple to use themes .We create trends that many follow.We innovate.

item.title: The stroy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[column width="1/1" last="true" title="" title_type="single" divider="false" implicit="true"]
Aristotle made several efforts to explain how moral conduct contributes to the good life for human agents, including the Eqikh EudaimonhV and the Magna Moralia, but the most complete surviving statement of his views on morality occurs in the Eqikh Nikomacoi . [push h="20"] [blockquote cite="Aristotle"]There he considered the natural desire to achieve happiness, described the operation of human volition and moral deliberation, developed a theory of each virtue as the mean between vicious extremes, discussed the value of three kinds of friendship, and defended his conception of an ideal life of intellectual pursuit.[/blockquote]But on Aristotle’s view, the lives of individual human beings are invariably linked together in a social context.
In the Peri PoliV he speculated about the origins of the state, described and assessed the relative merits of various types of government, and listed the obligations of the individual citizen.
[/column]
